channel.title: [Delta]Auto cache downloader?

item.title: [Delta]Auto cache downloader?
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:1, topic:531958”]Now I’m trying to jar my client, but I’m having a problem with downloading the cache I follow this tut
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/212096-delta-making-webclient-delta.html
but when I run my client I get this

ojjhc0.png1276×553

after a little bit that small box goes bye, so a restart the client and same thing

heres my downloading

method13(15, (byte)4, "Downloading Cache"); Updater.get("https://www.dropbox.com/s/i8eofgpy84xl1m4/StormyNight317_cache.zip", "StormyNight317_cache.zip", "", "StormyNight317_cache"); } }

note I change my cache since I don’t want to people to use it, since I have my own custom models and other stuff

but what did I do wrong?[/quote]
If your not running it as a Java Applet, it cannot extract the cache as your system will deny it access.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Auto cache downloader?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

trying making the .zip by getting the files inside of the folder (do not zip the folder with the files inside) it probably is not unzipping your cache files correctly to your C:/

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Auto cache downloader?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Now I’m trying to jar my client, but I’m having a problem with downloading the cache I follow this tut
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/212096-delta-making-webclient-delta.html
but when I run my client I get this

ojjhc0.png1276×553

after a little bit that small box goes bye, so a restart the client and same thing

heres my downloading

method13(15, (byte)4, "Downloading Cache"); Updater.get("https://www.dropbox.com/s/i8eofgpy84xl1m4/StormyNight317_cache.zip", "StormyNight317_cache.zip", "", "StormyNight317_cache"); } }

note I change my cache since I don’t want to people to use it, since I have my own custom models and other stuff

but what did I do wrong?
